Class PooledRepositoryConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.btmatthews.atlas.jcr.config.PooledRepositoryConfiguration

  • @Configuration
public class PooledRepositoryConfiguration
extends Object
    Configuration when using a session pool.

    1.0.0
    Author:
    Brian Thomas Matthews
